templates.name: Productivity (Email/Calendar)
templates.description: Agents for managing emails, calendars, tasks, and personal productivity workflows.

agents.responsibility: Triage, categorize, and prioritize incoming emails
Manage calendar events, find availability, schedule meetings
Generate email drafts based on context and instructions

memory.short_term: Current email thread context, meeting details
memory.long_term: Contact preferences, common responses, scheduling patterns

example_goals: Build an email assistant that auto-categorizes and drafts responses
Create a calendar bot that finds meeting times across timezones
Design a task manager that syncs with email and calendar

templates.name: Coding Assistant
templates.description: Agents for code generation, review, debugging, and software development workflows.

agents.responsibility: Analyze requirements and create implementation plan
Generate code based on plan and specifications
Review generated code for quality, bugs, and improvements

memory.short_term: Current file context, recent changes, error messages
memory.long_term: Codebase patterns, past fixes, team conventions

example_goals: Build a coding assistant that can implement features from descriptions
Create a PR review bot that catches bugs and suggests improvements
Design a debugging agent that diagnoses and fixes errors

templates.name: Research/Analysis
templates.description: Agents for research, data analysis, report generation, and knowledge synthesis.

agents.responsibility: Break complex research questions into sub-queries
Search and retrieve information from multiple sources
Analyze findings and synthesize into coherent report

memory.short_term: Current research context, gathered sources, partial findings
memory.long_term: Past research topics, trusted sources, domain knowledge

example_goals: Build a research agent that compares products/services
Create a market analysis bot that tracks competitors
Design a literature review agent for academic research

templates.name: Customer Support
templates.description: Agents for handling customer inquiries, support tickets, and service workflows.

agents.responsibility: Classify incoming tickets and route to appropriate handler
Search knowledge base and provide solutions
Handle complex cases and escalate to humans when needed

memory.long_term: Common issues, resolution patterns, customer preferences

example_goals: Build a support chatbot that resolves common issues
Create a ticket routing system with intelligent escalation
Design a customer service agent with CRM integration

templates.name: Content Creation
templates.description: Agents for writing, editing, and publishing content across various formats.

agents.responsibility: Plan content structure, outline, and key messages
Generate content based on outline and style guidelines
Review, edit, and polish content for publication

memory.long_term: Brand voice, past content, audience preferences

example_goals: Build a blog writing assistant with SEO optimization
Create a social media content generator
Design a marketing copy agent with A/B testing

templates.name: Data Processing
templates.description: Agents for ETL, data transformation, and automated data pipeline workflows.

agents.responsibility: Extract data from various sources (APIs, files, databases)
Load processed data into target destinations

memory.long_term: Schema mappings, data quality rules, past job results

example_goals: Build an ETL agent that syncs data between systems
Create a data quality monitor with auto-correction
Design a report generator from multiple data sources

pattern_combinations.productivity: ReAct + Tool-Use for dynamic tool selection
pattern_combinations.customer-support: ReAct + Supervisor for routing and escalation
